version_description:
This release brings new features and enhancements for your Butterfly iQ:

• 80 new preset-specific text labels to assist you with annotations
• Color Doppler enhancements for MSK and Soft Tissue presets
This release brings minor fixes that enhance overall app stability.
This release brings minor fixes that enhance overall performance.
This release brings minor fixes that enhance overall performance.

This release brings new features and enhancements for your Butterfly iQ:
• Learn ultrasound on the go with the new Butterfly Education portal featuring hundreds of videos at your fingertips
• Sharing just got easier. Now share images/clips without patient information directly to social media directly from the Butterfly iQ app

This release brings new features and enhancements for your Butterfly iQ:
• Annotating clips is now possible! Label clips after you capture them to ensure they have all the information you need, making review and collaboration simpler.
• Need help remembering your last depth/gain settings? You can now set the Butterfly iQ app to recall the most recently used depth and gain settings.

This release brings new features and enhancements to your Butterfly iQ:
• iQ app is now available in additional languages (Spanish, French, Dutch, Finnish, Polish, Portuguese, Italian, Danish, German, Swedish, Norwegian)
• Option to require a pin code on app launch for extra security
• Improved support for the latest iPhone and iPad models

This release brings new features and enhancements to your Butterfly iQ:
• iQ app is now available in additional languages (Spanish, French, Dutch, Finnish, Polish, Portuguese, Italian, Danish, German, Swedish, Norwegian)
• Option to require a pin code on app launch for extra security
• Improved support for the latest iPhone and iPad models

This release brings new features and enhancements to your Butterfly iQ:
- Another imaging mode - We’ve added Power Doppler across six presets, including Abdomen, Abdomen Deep and Bladder.
- Labeling gets even better - You can now add labels on images and clips after you capture them in the app.

This release brings new features and enhancements to your Butterfly iQ:
- A new Auto Bladder Volume Tool enables automatic calculation of bladder volume.
- Power Doppler is now available across additional presets: Vascular: Carotid, Vascular: Deep Vein, Vascular: Access, Nerve, Musculoskeletal, MSK-Soft Tissue, Small Organ.
- Some probes now support HLD (high-level disinfection): check the “My iQ” page in the settings menu with your probe plugged in to see if your probe supports it.

We've added our second AI application! This release adds Simpson’s Ejection Fraction for manual and automatic calculation of left ventricle ejection fraction using the Simpson's Monoplane method on an apical 4-chamber view of the heart. This is our second AI application, in addition to automated bladder volume measurement. To use these AI features, click on the tools present at the bottom right of the app when you're in the cardiac or bladder preset.

This release brings new features and enhancements to your Butterfly iQ:
- Ophthalmic imaging is now available in Europe for iQs that support high-level disinfection (HLD). To see if your iQ supports HLD, connect it to your mobile device, open the app, navigate to “Settings”, select “My iQ”. (Not available in the US)
- Improved clarity around the length of time your iQ will take to update its firmware.

This release brings new features and enhancements to your Butterfly iQ:
- Improved interface for accessing Modes and Tools
- Refer-a-friend to give them 3 complimentary months of Butterfly Pro membership (US only)
- Extend offline use beyond 30-day limit (available upon request through Butterfly Support)
- Now access the Butterfly Support Portal directly from the App
- We no longer support iOS 11, to continue receiving Butterfly iQ updates please upgrade to iOS 12 or later
- Butterfly catalog number (REF): 975-20003-00

This release brings new features and enhancements to your Butterfly iQ:
- Notification of a pending probe firmware update
- Enable the ability to capture a still by pressing the button on the probe (via the settings menu)
- Pulsed Wave Doppler available in the Vascular: Access preset (US only)
- Perform Fetal Biometrics and Amniotic Fluid Index calculations, available via the actions menu in the obstetric preset
- Save and share the 3D Bladder volume view (not available in the US, Canada)
- Butterfly catalog number (REF): 975-20003-00

This release brings new features and enhancements to your Butterfly iQ:
- Butterfly iQ is now compatible with the Trophon2 system for High-Level Disinfection (HLD). To see if your iQ supports HLD, connect it to your mobile device, open the app, navigate to “Settings”, select “My iQ”.

As we continue to improve our App, version 1.21 brings minor enhancements.  If you have questions or need support, head over to support.butterflynetwork.com and we’ll point you in the right direction.
As we continue to improve our App, version 1.23 brings minor enhancements. If you have questions or need support, head over to support.butterflynetwork.com and we’ll point you in the right direction.
